title: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse: Slate Spoiler Specials
description:
Slate's Dana Stevens and Lizzie Skurnick discuss The Twilight Saga: Eclipse. WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie.
